forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers this afternoon. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this morning will give way to occasional showers during the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 60F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 62F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 64F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
